title: .NET Core and Mono MSBuilds should say so in their logo
body:
As is, these outputs are almost indistinguishable:

```
C:\>msbuild /version
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 15.1.543.12259
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

15.1.543.12259
C:\>dotnet msbuild /version
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 15.1.539.38876
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

15.1.539.38876
```

But it can be relevant to debugging to know whether the engine was full framework or .NET Core or Mono--assembly loading and tasks can be different between them.

Maybe something like

```
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 15.1.539.38876 for .NET Core
```
